Interface for chatting with local LLMs

Related repos

  • UI for chatting with local Ollama models
  • python library for running and managing local LLMs with simple chat and streaming support
  • minimal LLM chat app runs in your browser, supports Ollama and OpenAI, multi-server, text and vision models
  • Web interface for Ollama LLMs
  • open source chat interface for LLMs
  • Terminal client for Ollama with chat session persistence
  • Chat interface for local LLMs with persistent memory
